title: Skilled hands and sure feet
creator_credit: Anthony Perris, Alex MacKay and York Television Centre
brief_description: Modern equipment and techniques in industry necessitate the wearing of safety gloves and boots, to prevent accidents happening. Stresses the need for supervision to prevent carelessness. Shows testing of clothing.
creator_credit_for_label: Anthony Perris, Alex MacKay and York Television Centre
